3000.name: The Reading Room
3000.description: You are in a small, simple room which is mostly empty, save a few wooden desks and benches.  To the east you hear the bustle of the Temple of Midgaard, a sharp contrast to the relative quiet of this peaceful room.

east.description: You see the Temple of Midgaard.

3001.name: The Temple Of Midgaard
3001.description: You are in the southern end of the temple hall in the Temple of Midgaard. The temple has been constructed from giant marble blocks, eternal in appearance, and most of the walls are covered by ancient wall paintings picturing Gods, Giants and peasants.    Large steps lead down through the grand temple gate, descending the huge mound upon which the temple is built and ends on the temple square below. To the west, you see the Reading Room.  The donation room is in a small alcove to your east.

north.description: At the northern end of the temple hall is a statue and a huge altar.

east.description: In the east, you see a small alcove with a rickety wooden sign which reads "Midgaard Donation Room."

south.description: You look down the huge stone steps at the temple square below.

up.description: A shimmering staircase of light ascends to the realm of the Immortals.

3002.name: The Clerics' Inner Sanctum
3002.description: This is the inner sanctum.  A picture of the mighty Thor, is hanging on the wall, just above the altar which is set against the western wall.  A well in the middle of the floor leads down into darkness.  Vile smells waft from the depths.

east.description: You see your favorite place, the bar of divination.

down.description: You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be impossible to climb back up.

3003.name: The Bar Of Divination
3003.description: The bar is one of the finest in the land, lucky it is members only.  Fine furniture is set all around the room.  A small sign is hanging on the wall.

3004.name: The Entrance To The Clerics' Guild
3004.description: The entrance hall is a small modest room, reflecting the true nature of the Clerics.  The exit leads east to the temple square.  A small entrance to the bar is in the northern wall.

north.description: You see the bar, richly decorated with really stylish furniture.

3005.name: The Temple Square
3005.description: You are standing on the temple square.  Huge marble steps lead up to the temple gate.  The entrance to the Clerics' Guild is to the west, and the old Grunting Boar Inn, is to the east.  Just south of here you see the market square, the center of Midgaard.

east.description: You see the good old Grunting Boar Inn.

west.description: You see the entrance to the Clerics' Guild.

3006.name: The Entrance Hall Of The Grunting Boar Inn
3006.description: You are standing in the entrance hall of the Grunting Boar Inn.  The hall has been wisely decorated with simple, functional furniture.  The heavy smell of dust and aging paper drifts in from the Post Office to the north.  A small staircase leads up to the reception and the bar is to the east.

north.description: You see the Midgaard Post Office.

3007.name: The Grunting Boar
3007.description: You are standing in the bar.  The bar is set against the northern wall, old archaic writing, carvings and symbols cover its top.  A fireplace is built into the western wall, and through the southeastern windows you can see the temple square.  This place makes you feel like home. A small sign with big letters is fastened to the bar.

west.description: You see the exit to the entrance hall.

3008.name: The Reception
3008.description: You are standing in the reception.  The staircase leads down to the entrance hall.  An exit to the north leads to the Cryogenic Center. There is a small sign on the counter.

3010.name: The General Store
3010.description: You are inside the general store.  All sorts of items are stacked on shelves behind the counter, safely out of your reach. A small note hangs on the wall.

3011.name: The Weapon Shop
3011.description: You are inside the weapon shop.  There is a small note on the counter.

3012.name: Main Street
3012.description: You are at the end of the main street of Midgaard.  South of here is the entrance to the Guild of Magic Users.  The street continues east towards the market square.  The magic shop is to the north and to the west is the city gate.

south.description: You see the entrance to the Guild of Magic Users.

3013.name: Main Street
3013.description: You are on the main street passing through the City of Midgaard.  South of here is the entrance to the Armory, and the bakery is to the north.  East of here is the market square.

3014.name: Market Square
3014.description: You are standing on the market square, the famous Square of Midgaard. A large, peculiar looking statue is standing in the middle of the square. Roads lead in every direction, north to the temple square, south to the common square, east and westbound is the main street.

3015.name: Main Street
3015.description: You are on the main street crossing through town.  To the north is the general store, and the main street continues east.  To the west you see and hear the market place, to the south a small door leads into the Pet Shop.

3016.name: Main Street
3016.description: The main street, to the north is the weapon shop and to the south is the Guild of Swordsmen.  To the east you leave town and to the west the street leads to the market square.

west.description: You see the main street leading to the market square.

3017.name: The Entrance To The Mages' Guild
3017.description: The entrance hall to this guild is a small, poor lighted room.

south.description: You see your favorite place, the Mages' Bar.

3018.name: The Mages' Bar
3018.description: The bar is one of the weirdest in the land.  Mystical images float around the air.  Illusions of fine furniture appear all around the room.

3019.name: The Mages' Laboratory
3019.description: This is the Magical Experiments Laboratory.  Dark smoke-stained stones arch over numerous huge oaken tables, most of these cluttered with strange- looking pipes and flasks.  The floor is covered with half-erased pentagrams and even weirder symbols, and a blackboard in a dark corner has only been partially cleaned, some painful-looking letters faintly visible.  A well in the middle of the floor leads down into darkness.  Vile smells waft from the depths.

down.description: You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be impossible to climb back up.

3020.name: The Armory
3020.description: The armory with all kinds of armors on the walls and in the window.  You see helmets, shields and chain mails.  To the north is the main street. On the wall is a small note.

3021.name: The Entrance Hall To The Guild Of Swordsmen
3021.description: The entrance hall to the Guild of Swordsmen.  A place where one has to be careful not to say something wrong (or right).  To the east is the bar and to the north is the main street.

east.description: You see the swordsmen's bar, many noises comes from there.

3022.name: The Bar Of Swordsmen
3022.description: The bar of swordsmen, once upon a time beautifully furnished.  But now the furniture is all around you in small pieces.  To the south is the yard, and to the west is the entrance hall.

west.description: You see the entrance hall to the warriors' guild.

3023.name: The Tournament And Practice Yard
3023.description: This is the practice yard of the fighters.  To the north is the bar. A well leads down into darkness.

down.description: You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be impossible to climb back up.

3024.name: The Eastern End Of Poor Alley
3024.description: You are at the poor alley.  South of here is the Grubby Inn and to the east you see common square.  The alley continues further west.

3025.name: The Common Square
3025.description: The common square, people pass you, talking to each other.  To the west is the poor alley and to the east is the dark alley.  To the north, this square is connected to the market square.  From the south you notice a nasty smell.

3026.name: The Dark Alley
3026.description: The dark alley, to the west is the common square and to the south is the Guild of Thieves.  The alley continues east.

south.description: You see the entrance to the thieves' guild.

3027.name: The Entrance Hall To The Guild Of Thieves
3027.description: The entrance hall to the thieves' and assassins' guild.  A place where you can lose both your life and your money, if you are not careful.  To the north is the dark alley and to the east is the thieves' bar.

east.description: You see the thieves bar, where everything disappears.

3028.name: The Thieves' Bar
3028.description: The bar of the thieves.  Once upon a time this place was beautifully furnished, but now it seems almost empty.  To the south is the yard, and to the west is the entrance hall.    (Maybe the furniture has been stolen?!)

west.description: You see the entrance hall to the thieves' guild.

3029.name: The Secret Yard
3029.description: The secret practice yard of thieves and assassins.  To the north is the bar.  A well leads down into darkness.

down.description: You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be impossible to climb back up.

3030.name: The Dump
3030.description: The dump, where the people from the city drop their garbage.  Through the garbage you can see a large junction of pipes, looks like the entrance to the sewer system.  North of here you see the common square.

3031.name: The Pet Shop
3031.description: The Pet Shop is a small crowded store, full of cages and animals of various sizes.  There is a sign on the wall.

3032.name: Pet Shop Store
3032.description: This  is the small dark room in which the Pet shop keeps his pets. It is vital that this room's virtual number is exactly one larger than the Pet Shop number.

3033.name: The Magic Shop
3033.description: Behind the counter you see various items, neatly placed in racks, presumably most of them are magic.

3040.name: Inside The West Gate Of Midgaard
3040.description: You are by two small towers that have been built into the city wall and connected with a footbridge across the heavy wooden gate.  Main Street leads east and Wall Road leads south from here.

south.description: You see the road running along the inner side of the city wall.  You notice that it is called Wall Road.

west.description: The city gate is to the west.

3041.name: Inside The East Gate Of Midgaard
3041.description: You are by two small towers that have been built into the city wall and connected with a footbridge across the heavy wooden gate.  Main Street leads west from here.  To the south you see the Water Shop.

3042.name: Wall Road
3042.description: You are walking next to the western city wall.  The road continues further south and the city gate is just north of here.

3043.name: Wall Road
3043.description: You are walking next to the western city wall.  Wall Road continues further north and south.  A small, poor alley leads east. Some letters have been written on the wall here.

3044.name: Poor Alley
3044.description: You are on Poor Alley, which continues further east.  You see the city wall to the west.

3045.name: The Dark Alley At The Levee
3045.description: You are standing in the alley which continues east and west.  South of here you see the levee.

3046.name: The Eastern End Of The Alley
3046.description: You are standing at the eastern end of the alley, the city wall is just east, blocking any further movement.  A small warehouse is directly south of here.

3047.name: Wall Road
3047.description: You are standing on the road next to the western city wall, which continues north.  South of here is a bridge across the river.

3048.name: Grubby Inn
3048.description: You are inside the old Grubby Inn.  This place has not been cleaned for several decades; vile smells make you dizzy.

3049.name: The Levee
3049.description: You are at the levee.  South of here you see the river gently flowing west. The river bank is very low making it possible to enter the river.

south.description: You see the river flowing west.

3050.name: The Deserted Warehouse
3050.description: You are inside the warehouse.  The room is decorated with various old items from ships.

3051.name: On The Bridge
3051.description: You are standing on the stone bridge crosses the river.  The bridge is built out from the western city wall and the river flows west through an opening in the wall ten feet below the bridge.

3052.name: Outside The West Gate Of Midgaard
3052.description: You are by two small towers that have been built into the city wall and connected with a footbridge across the heavy wooden gate.  To the west you can see the edge of a big forest.

east.description: The city gate is to the east.

west.description: The forest edge is to the west.

3053.name: Outside The East Gate Of Midgaard
3053.description: You are by two small towers that have been built into the city wall and connected with a footbridge across the heavy wooden gate.  To the east the plains stretch out in the distance.

3054.name: By The Temple Altar
3054.description: You are by the temple altar in the northern end of the Temple of Midgaard.  A huge altar made from white polished marble is standing in front of you and behind it is a ten foot tall sitting statue of Odin, the King of the Gods.    To the north, steps lead out the back of the temple towards the countryside.

north.description: You see the vast Midgaard countryside.

south.description: You see the southern end of the temple.

extra_descs.ven though the altar is more than ten fe: a single block of white virgin marble.

3055.name: Odin's Store
3055.description: This is the small dark room in which Odin keeps the player items that he takes care of.  It is vital that this room's virtual number is exactly one larger than the room by the temple altar.

3058.name: Ye Olde Water Shoppe
3058.description: You are standing in the center of a small wooden shop whose walls are covered with racks upon racks of water jugs.  Several large barrels with spigots are stacked in the corner.

3059.name: Behind The Temple Altar
3059.description: You are on a dirt path leading away from the Temple Altar which is south of here.  To the north, the path continues through the lush contryside of Midgaard towards the Dragonhelm Mountains far off to the north.

north.description: You see the lush, green countryside of Midgaard.

3060.name: The Great Field Of Midgaard
3060.description: You are walking on a wide dirt path through the lush, green, fresh Midgaard countryside.  You can see to the horizon to the north, east, and west; the busy city of Midgaard lies to the south.  All around you is healthy green grass and an occasional large oak tree.  The sun feels wonderful on your face and a pleasant wind blows through your hair.  Birds chirp quietly to themselves and you can smell the faint scent of flowers and freshly cut grass.  You feel like you could lie down in the grass and stay here forever, surrounded by powerful beauty in all directions.    The path you are on continues north through the field and south back to Midgaard.

north.description: You see more of the path through the Great Field.

south.description: You see the path which goes back to Midgaard.

3061.name: The Great Field Of Midgaard
3061.description: You are walking on a wide dirt path through the lush, green, fresh Midgaard countryside.  You can see to the horizon to the north, east, and west; the busy city of Midgaard lies to the south.  All around you is healthy green grass and an occasional large oak tree.  The sun feels wonderful on your face and a pleasant wind blows through your hair.  Birds chirp quietly to themselves and you can smell the faint scent of flowers and freshly cut grass.  You feel like you could lie down in the grass and stay here forever, surrounded by powerful beauty in all directions.    There is a strange structure on the eastern side of the path.  A small dirt path splits off of the main path and leads off to the west.

north.description: The path continues northwards bringing you ever closer to the Dragonhelm Mountains.

east.description: There is a strange structure to the east on the edge of the trail.

south.description: You see more of the Field.

west.description: There is a strange path leading towards a rusty gate to the west.

3062.name: The Post Office
3062.description: You are in the central post office for Midgaard.  Piles of assorted mail lay untouched in the corners, collecting cobwebs.  Several large crates have been pried open by curious customs agents, and are now stacked along the west wall, hiding plenty of 'WANTED' posters. There is a sign posted on the wall here.

south.description: You see the entrance to the Grunting Boar Inn and Tavern.

extra_descs.nvelopes of all sizes are heaped into hu: look closer, you see a letter that you had posted a full week ago, laying unnoticed and slightly rat-chewed towards the bottom of the pile.

3063.name: The Midgaard Donation Room
3063.description: You are in a small, undecorated room just off of the main temple.  There are a couple of small wooden benches here where people occasionally sit while they wait for items to appear.  The temple is to the west.

west.description: The busy temple is back west.

3064.name: The Cryogenic Center
3064.description: You are standing in an impossible white sterile room with cylindrical body-length canisters lined up against the walls.  The Reception is to the south.

south.description: The Reception is to the south.

3065.name: The Great Field Of Midgaard
3065.description: You are walking on a wide dirt path through the lush, green, fresh Midgaard countryside.  You can see to the horizon to the north, east, and west; the busy city of Midgaard lies to the south.  All around you is healthy green grass and an occasional large oak tree.  The sun feels wonderful on your face and a pleasant wind blows through your hair.  Birds chirp quietly to themselves and you can smell the faint scent of flowers and freshly cut grass.  You feel like you could lie down in the grass and stay here forever, surrounded by powerful beauty in all directions.    The way north appears to be blocked by a large plot device and you cannot see any way around it.

south.description: The path continues through the field to the south past an odd structure on the eastern side of the path.

3066.name: The Dirt Path
3066.description: You are walking along a narrow dirt path through the lush, green, fresh Midgaard countryside.  You can see to the horizon to the north and east; the busy city of Midgaard lies to the south.  All around you is healthy green grass and an occasional large oak tree.  The sun feels wonderful on your face and a pleasant wind blows through your hair.  Birds chirp quietly to themselves and you can smell the faint scent of flowers and freshly cut grass.  You feel like you could lie down in the grass and stay here forever, surrounded by powerful beauty in all directions.    There is a large rusty gate sitting in a stone archway just to the west.

east.description: The path meets up with a larger path just to the east.

west.description: There is a large rusty gate just to the west.

3000.name: wizard
3000.long_desc: A wizard walks around behind the counter, talking to himself.
3000.description:
The wizard looks old and senile, and yet he looks like a very powerful
wizard.  He is equipped with fine clothing, and is wearing many fine
rings and bracelets.

3001.name: baker
3001.long_desc: The baker looks at you calmly, wiping flour from his face with one hand.
3001.description:
A fat, nice looking baker.  But you can see that he has many scars on his
body.

3002.name: grocer
3002.long_desc: A grocer stands at the counter, with a slightly impatient look on his face.
3002.description: A tall grocer, who moves two 200 pounds bag of flour around on his shoulders.

3003.name: weaponsmith
3003.description:
He is a young weaponsmith, who still has lots to learn but he is still
eager to sell you his latest implements of carnage and destruction.

3004.name: armourer
3004.long_desc: An armourer stands here displaying his new (and previously owned) armours.
3004.description:
An old but very strong armourer.  He has made more suits of armour in his
life than you have ever seen.

3005.name: receptionist
3005.long_desc: A receptionist is standing behind the counter here, smiling at you.
3005.description:
You notice a tired look in her face.  She looks like she isn't paid well
enough to put up with any crap from mud players with attitudes.

3006.name: captain
3006.long_desc: A retired captain stands here, selling boats.
3006.description: This captain has eaten more sharks than you have killed peas.

3007.name: sailor
3007.long_desc: A sailor stands here, waiting to help you.
3007.description: He looks like a strong, fit sailor.

3008.name: uncle
3008.long_desc: Uncle Juan is here ready to take your order.
3008.description: He looks like he may or may not have a green card.

3009.name: wally
3009.long_desc: Wally the Watermaster is standing behind the counter.
3009.description:
Wally is a bit pudgy but looks very strong.  He has a glass of Midgaard
Natural Spring Water in his hand.  When he notices you, he proudly
displays his fine collection of contemporary waters.

3010.name: postmaster
3010.long_desc: The head postmaster is standing here, waiting to help you with your mail.
3010.description:
The Postmaster seems like a happy old man, though a bit sluggish.  He
worries about the reputation of the MMS (Midgaard Mail Service), as many
people seem to think that it is slow.  Perhaps if he were to brush the
cobwebs from his uniform it would help to make a better impression.

3020.name: guildmaster
3020.long_desc: Your guildmaster is studying a spellbook while preparing to cast a spell.
3020.description:
Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the
vast amount of knowledge she possesses.  She is wearing fine magic clothing,
and you notice that she is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.

3021.name: guildmaster
3021.long_desc: Your guildmaster is prayer to your God here.
3021.description:
You are in no doubt that this guildmaster is truly close to your God; he
has a peaceful, loving look.  You notice that he is surrounded by a white
aura.

3022.name: guildmaster
3022.long_desc: A beggar is sitting here, could she be a guildmaster?
3022.description:
You realize that whenever your guildmaster moves, you fail to notice it -
the way of the true thief.  She is to be dressed in poor clothing, having
the appearance of a beggar.

3023.name: guildmaster
3023.long_desc: Your guildmaster is standing here sharpening an axe.
3023.description:
This is your master. Big and strong with bulging muscles. Several scars
across his body proves that he was using arms before you were born. He
has a calm look on his face.

3024.name: sorcerer
3024.long_desc: A sorcerer is guarding the entrance.
3024.description:
He is an experienced mage who has specialized in the field of Combat Magic.
He is here to guard the Mage's Guild and his superior knowledge of offensive
as well as defensive spells make him a deadly opponent.

3025.name: knight
3025.long_desc: A knight templar is guarding the entrance.
3025.description:
He is a specially trained warrior belonging to the military order of the
Faith.  His duty is to protect the faithful from persecution and infidel
attacks and his religious devotion combined with his superior skill makes
him a deadly opponent.

3026.name: assassin
3026.long_desc: An assassin is guarding the entrance.
3026.description:
He is a thief who has specialized in killing others as effectively as
possible, using all sorts of weapons.  His superior knowledge of how
and where to use them combined with his extraordinary stealth makes
him a deadly opponent.

3027.name: knight
3027.long_desc: A knight is guarding the entrance.
3027.description:
He is an expert warrior who has attained knighthood through countless
chivalrous deeds.  His duty is to protect the Guild of Swordsmen and his
extreme skill combined with his experience in warfare makes him a deadly
opponent.

3040.name: bartender
3040.long_desc: A bartender watches you calmly, while he skillfully mixes a drink.
3040.description: A tired looking Bartender who hates trouble in his bar.

3041.name: waiter
3041.long_desc: A waiter is going around from one place to another.

3042.name: waiter
3042.long_desc: A man now leads a quiet, peaceful life as a waiter is standing here.
3042.description:
This man was obviously a famous sorcerer in his younger days as you
instantly recognize his face.

3043.name: waiter
3043.long_desc: A waiter who seems to have reached contact with his God is standing here.
3043.description:
This waiter almost makes you feel like you should drop to your knees
and begin to worship your God.  Naaah.

3044.name: waiter
3044.long_desc: A waiter who knows where all his customers keep their money is standing here.
3044.description: Hmmm... wonder where he got that coin he is playing with.

3045.name: waiter
3045.description:
This guy looks like he could easily kill you while still carrying
quite a few firebreathers.

3046.name: filthy
3046.long_desc: Filthy is standing here, eager to serve you a special drink.
3046.description:
Filthy looks real, ehm, dirty.  He likes to keep his customers happy,
but do not mess with him or else he'll get upset.

3059.name: keeper
3059.long_desc: A Peacekeeper is standing here, ready to jump in at the first sign of trouble.
3059.description: He looks very strong and wise.  Looks like he doesn't answer to ANYONE.

3060.name: cityguard
3060.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

3061.name: janitor
3061.long_desc: A janitor is walking around, cleaning up.
3061.description: What a tough job he has.

3062.name: fido
3062.long_desc: A beastly fido is mucking through the garbage looking for food here.
3062.description:
The fido is a small dog that has a foul smell and pieces of rotted meat
hanging around his teeth.

3063.name: mercenary
3063.long_desc: A mercenary is waiting for a job here.
3063.description: He looks pretty mean, and you imagine he'd do anything for money.

3064.name: drunk
3064.description: A drunk who seems to be too happy, and to carry too much money.

3065.name: beggar
3065.long_desc: A beggar is here, asking for a few coins.
3065.description: The beggar looks like she is fed up with life.

3066.name: odif
3066.long_desc: An odif yltsaeb is here, walking backwards.
3066.description: The odif is a small god that has been reversed by some dog.

3067.name: cityguard
3067.long_desc: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.
3067.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

3068.name: green
3068.long_desc: An oozing green gelatinous blob is here, sucking in bits of debris.
3068.description: A horrid looking thing; it is huge, greenish, and looks like the blob.

3089.name: pet
3089.long_desc: There is a Pet Shop Boy standing here cuddleing something furry in his hands.
3089.description: As you look at him, he opens his hands to reveal a rat!

3090.name: kitten
3090.long_desc: A small loyal kitten is here.
3090.description: The kitten looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

3091.name: puppy
3091.long_desc: A small loyal puppy is here.
3091.description: The puppy looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

3092.name: beagle
3092.long_desc: A small, quick, loyal beagle is here.
3092.description: The beagle looks like a fierce fighter.

3093.name: rottweiler
3093.long_desc: A large, loyal rottweiler is here.
3093.description: The rottweiler looks like a strong, fierce fighter.

3094.name: wolf
3094.long_desc: A large, trained wolf is here.
3094.description: The wolf looks like a strong, fearless fighter.

3095.name: cryogenicist
3095.long_desc: The cryogenicist is here, playing with a canister of liquid nitrogen.
3095.description:
You notice a tired look in her face.  She looks like she isn't paid well
enough to put up with any crap from mud players with attitudes.

3000.name: barrel
3000.room_desc: A beer barrel has been left here.

3001.name: bottle
3001.room_desc: A beer bottle has been left here.

3002.name: bottle
3002.room_desc: A dark bottle of ale has been left here.

3003.name: bottle
3003.room_desc: A bottle of firebreather has been left here.

3004.name: bottle
3004.room_desc: A dark bottle has been left here.

3005.name: key
3005.room_desc: A key made of a dull metal is lying on the ground here.

3009.name: waybread
3009.room_desc: Some waybread has been put here.

3010.name: bread
3010.room_desc: A loaf of bread has been left here.

3011.name: danish
3011.room_desc: A nice looking delicious danish pastry has been placed here.

3012.name: taco
3012.room_desc: A tasty looking Mexican taco has been dropped here.

3013.name: burrito
3013.room_desc: A spicy looking burrito has been set here.

3014.name: nachos
3014.room_desc: Some nachos have been left here.

3015.name: meat
3015.room_desc: A rather dubious looking piece of meat is on the ground here.

3020.name: dagger
3020.room_desc: A dagger with a long thin blade is here.

3022.name: sword
3022.room_desc: A long sword has been left here.

3023.name: club
3023.room_desc: A simple looking wooden club is here.

3024.name: warhammer
3024.room_desc: A medium sized warhammer is here.

3034.name: atm
3034.room_desc: An automatic teller machine has been installed in the wall here.

3035.name: fountain
3035.room_desc: A large fountain carved from blue-streaked marble is here, bubbling merrily.

3036.name: cashcard
3036.room_desc: A handy dandy cashcard is sitting on the ground here.

3038.name: nail
3038.room_desc: A penny nail lies in the dust.

3039.name: pot
3039.room_desc: A cast-iron pot sits on the ground.

3040.name: plate
